jpo
Class PictureInfoChangeEvent

java.lang.Object
  jpo.PictureInfoChangeEvent
public class PictureInfoChangeEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Objects of this class have details about what was changed in a PictureInfo object. Several things may have changed in a single event.

See Also:
PictureInfo

Field Summary
private  boolean checksumChanged
          indicates whether the highresLocation was changed.
private  boolean commentChanged
          indicates whether the comment was changed.

          indicates whether the copyright holder was changed.

          indicates whether the lowresLocation description was changed.
